lead_paragraph: Lee Mazzilli, whose playing and coaching career has bounced between the Yankees and Mets since 1976, became the studio analyst for at least 85 games on SportsNet New York. He is the third member of the 1986 Mets to be hired by SNY, joining Keith Hernandez and Ron Darling.
